text: void main ( ) { int T , i , j , N , k ; long int a [ MAX ] , count = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; i = 0 ; while ( i < N ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; i ++ ; } j = 0 ; while ( j < N ) { k = 0 ; for ( i = j ; i <= j + 1 && i < N ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] < a [ i ] ) k ++ ; else k ; } if ( k > 0 ) { count = count + 2 ; } else count = count + 1 ; j ++ ; } printf ( "The no. of sub array are: %ld\n" , count ) ; count = 0 ; } }
